name: @saeon/quick-form
description: Quickly add localised state to your component tree

scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && TC=utc node ../../../scripts/publish.js -p @saeon/quick-form -s patch
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && TC=utc node ../../../scripts/publish.js -p @saeon/quick-form -s minor
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && TC=utc node ../../../scripts/publish.js -p @saeon/quick-form -s major

author: zach@saeon.ac.za
